trans-unit.source: Provides access to the main buffered graphics context object for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso ao principal objeto de contexto de gráficos em buffer para o domínio de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager> class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager> classe permite que você implemente o buffer duplo personalizado para seus elementos gráficos.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Elementos gráficos que usam o buffer duplo podem reduzir ou eliminar a cintilação causado redesenhando uma superfície de exibição.

trans-unit.source: This class has one static property, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, which returns the main <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe tem uma propriedade estática, <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>, que retorna o principal <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o domínio de aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> class creates <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instances that can be used to draw buffered graphics.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> classe cria <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> instâncias que podem ser usadas para desenhar os elementos gráficos em buffer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> classe não tem construtor público e deve ser criada pelo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> objeto para um domínio de aplicativo usando sua <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode recuperar o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> objeto para o domínio de aplicativo atual de estático <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information on double buffering, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, and <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre buffer duplo, consulte [gráficos em buffer duplo](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics.md), <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>, e <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates acquiring the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a adquirir o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o domínio de aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> para o domínio do aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext" /> para o domínio do aplicativo atual.

trans-unit.source: Within an application the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A> property always returns the same <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Dentro de um aplicativo de <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A> propriedade sempre retorna o mesmo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates acquiring the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a adquirir o <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> para o domínio de aplicativo atual.
